PackageOracle.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_CHANGE_LOG
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_CHANGE_LOG
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.466740000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,change_log_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,change_log_seq_num IN NUMBER
,change_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,field_techn_associate_id IN NUMBER
,field_technician_id IN VARCHAR2
,operator_associate_id IN NUMBER
,operator_id IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_dispatch_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_rschd_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_schd_dt IN DATE
,work_order_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,change_log_seq_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_work_order_change_log;

body.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_CHANGE_LOG
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_CHANGE_LOG
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.477780000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,change_log_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,change_log_seq_num IN NUMBER
,change_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,field_techn_associate_id IN NUMBER
,field_technician_id IN VARCHAR2
,operator_associate_id IN NUMBER
,operator_id IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_dispatch_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,work_order_rschd_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_schd_dt IN DATE
,work_order_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,work_order_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_change_log.add, parms=' || change_log_dttm || '|' || change_log_seq_num || '|' || change_type_nm || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || field_techn_associate_id || '|' || field_technician_id || '|' || operator_associate_id || '|' || operator_id || '|' || work_order_dispatch_cd || '|' || work_order_id || '|' || work_order_rschd_rsn_cd || '|' || work_schd_dt || '|' || work_order_status_cd || '|' || work_order_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order_change_log a
(
a.change_log_dttm
,a.change_log_seq_num
,a.change_type_nm
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.field_techn_associate_id
,a.field_technician_id
,a.operator_associate_id
,a.operator_id
,a.work_order_dispatch_cd
,a.work_order_id
,a.work_order_rschd_rsn_cd
,a.work_schd_dt
,a.work_order_status_cd
,a.work_order_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.change_log_dttm
,add.change_log_seq_num
,add.change_type_nm
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.field_techn_associate_id
,add.field_technician_id
,add.operator_associate_id
,add.operator_id
,add.work_order_dispatch_cd
,add.work_order_id
,add.work_order_rschd_rsn_cd
,add.work_schd_dt
,add.work_order_status_cd
,add.work_order_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_change_log.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,change_log_seq_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_change_log.del, parms=' || work_order_id || '|' || change_log_seq_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_work_order_change_log a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.work_order_id = del.work_order_id
AND a.change_log_seq_num = del.change_log_seq_num
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_change_log.del');

END del;

END da_work_order_change_log;
